Package eu.greenlightning.hypercubepdf.layout

One-dimensional layout algorithms used by containers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HCPLayout
    Represents a one-dimensional layout algorithm which is independent of the axis on which it is applied.
    HCPLayoutResults
    An iterator over the results of a layout process.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HCPFlowLayout
    A layout algorithm which always uses the elements preferred size.
    HCPLayoutSpace
    Defines the space in which a layout algorithm should place the elements.
    HCPSpacedLayout
    Base class for layout algorithms which allow to introduce spacing between adjacent elements.
    HCPSplitLayout
    A layout algorithm which splits the available space equally among the elements, regardless of their preferred size.
    HCPStretchLayout
    A layout algorithm which keeps the ratios between the element's sizes the same, but squeezes or stretches them so that all elements together take up all available space.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HCPEmptyLayoutResults
    An empty HCPLayoutResults.

Package eu.greenlightning.hypercubepdf.layout Description

One-dimensional layout algorithms used by containers.

These layout algorithms are independent of the axis on which they are applied. They are provided with the sizes of the elements which can either be their widths or their their heights, depending on whether the container wants to apply the layout horizontally or vertically.
